title: anyone want a copy of pitt sales brochure

posts.content:
[quote="johnny k"]club shop does/did the repro badges.
according to my old pitt brochure,the badge goes on the lh cargo door just below the swage line!!
not the best place.i actually stuck mine to the side of the door mounted cooker.[/quote


badge club shop
who do isee

Hi ,I know its a long shot ,i have bought a 65 pitt with a pop top in the last few months and i would love a copy if you have any left,i am too happy to give a Â£5 to the poppy apeal.
Happy to send you a stamped address env too.

Kind Regards

T

it arrived , i wondering what year this is from as am very iterested in the front bench seat with the back rest pulling upwards into a bed in front cabin , did not realise how many differant combinations you can make for sleeping it says 8 possible
I have a October 61 walkthrough, does brochure cover this or is it for later models?

Brochure still available all this time later??

Did any one have any luck with the badge?????

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Aloha!
Yup can sort you out a copy of the brochure. Payment will be a couple of quid in the next help for heroes charity box you see please.
If you pm me the address you want it sent to I'll try to sort it out this week for you.

Shalom, Lee

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Funky, had a mind blank and forgot to do you a copy, will sort it early next week and get it sent out. Sorry, been a bit hectic of late...
Not sure anyone had any luck with the badges not heard anything. Had a look at my bro-in-laws and his is on the cooker and looks like that's where its always been. He's seeing about getting some of the bunk bed brackets made up so I'll see how that goes and post up if they turn out ok.

Shalom, Lee

No worries!

I know how hectic it can get, it's not a problem!

Any info re Canterburys Pitts I will be interested in!

Many thanks!

Mark

Don't really need the brochure, but is there any mention of awnings in there ?

What's it say if there is ?

I just bought a CP on Wednesday, still to sort out collection, but should get in in a cpl of weeks or so.

Any chance of a brochure ? I can pay, or make a donation to a charity.

Cheers

Les
